title: The lilac sunbonnet :
author: Crockett, S. R.
snippet: It so happened that it was night when they reached the high summit of the Leadhills and the village of Wanlock- Head gleamed grey beneath them.

title: Spare hours.
author: Brown, John
snippet: Indeed, this region was called in olden times " God's treasure- house in Scotland," and the four petty burns in which the precious yellow grains were found — Glengonar, Short Cleuch, Mennock, and "Wanlock — were compared to the four rivers in the Garden of the Lord, — Pison, Gihon, Hiddekel, and Euphrates ! Here was got the gold of which Kmg James's boyinet-pieces were made, hundreds of workmen being then employed in its search.
